name: Z-Tera Weather Cannon
effect: Effect: The User can choose whether this uses Strength or Special. If the User is terastallized, set the weather of the associated Tera-Type for 2 Rounds before attacking and this move's type becomes the same type.
description: Lily plugs her weather machine into her Tera Cannon and overcharges it to such a massive shot, that even the weather around her bends to its energy.
